title: Wolves of the Open-Air Asylum
description: Every person has a past and every city has a history, it is when these two tales combine that you end up with the tangled mess that is life. Bisbee Arizona is a town with a turbulent past, but the arrival of the artists in 1975 saw the town blossom with peace and creativity. River seizes the opportunity of a quieter life and tries to settle down with his new partner. But some of the locals have other ideas, there is a secret battle taking place in the shadows, and River must decide on which side of the divide he will stand. The fate of the city rests on his shoulders, can he pull together the necessary people to enable the city to thrive or is it destined to burn?
author: D.F. Benham
